General.Name: ASA International Group PLC
General.Description: ASA International Group PLC provides microfinancing services in Africa and Asia. It offers loans to low-income female micro-entrepreneurs. It provides various collateral-free loans, including small and small business loans to start or grow businesses. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

1.Name: Mr. A. K. M. Aminur Rashid
1.Title: Exec. Director of Operations & Exec. Director

4.Name: Mr. Mohammed Azim Hossain
4.Title: Sr. VP of Investments, Treasury & Risk Management
